str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Nor, neither, not even, neither?nor. From me and te; not too, i.e. neither or nor; also, not even.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
Nor, neither, not even, neither?nor. From me and te; not too, i.e. neither or nor; also, not even.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.
